column4: i've had trouble with my debs list in 5.04 i want to paste this maybe someone can pinpoint what actually went wrong. this is one of many debs that went haywire on a 5.04 update
W: GPG error: http://security.debian.org sarge/updates Release: The following signatures couldn't be verified because the public key is not available: NO_PUBKEY F1D53D8C4F368D5D
why are you using debian repos?
